sentences.sentence: She had dared to cast a slur on his character.
sentences.translation: 她竟敢对他的人品加以诋毁。

sentences.sentence: This is yet another slur on the integrity of the police.
sentences.translation: 这将是对警察廉正的又一次毁谤。

sentences.sentence: They mumble, break all the rules of grammar, slur words and so on.
sentences.translation: 他们咕哝、打破所有语法规则、吞音等等。
